content.title: Specialities
content.subtitle: Resourceful and tech-savvy Web developer with at least 5 years of progressive experience in Web both in front-end and back-end. I'm currently available for new projects.

skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6), JQuery, Task Runners (Gulp, Grunt, and Webpack), Package Managers (Yarn and NPM), CSS Frameworks (Twitter Bootstrap, Bulma, and Tailwind CSS), Laravel Blade, CSS Preprocessors (SCSS / SASS), Methodologies (BEM), Grid System, WCAG Accesibility Compliance, Cross-browser compatibility practices (i.e, Firefox, Chrome, Safari, and Opera), ReactJS Framework, and JAMstack (Gatsby, Hugo, and Jekyll)

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: PHP (WordPress), Timber (Twig), Composer, and WordPress API (REST API)

skills.title: Server Administration
skills.description: Docker, Vagrant, Terminal (SSH, BASH, ZSH, MS-DOS), Open-Source Web Server Solutions (XAMPP, LAMP, LEMP, WAMP and MAMP), Remote Web Servers (cPanel and WHM Administration and VPS), Web Servers (Apache and NGINX), FTP, SFTP, and CLI (Command-Line Interface)

skills.title: Web Design (UI/UX)
skills.description: Sketch, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe XD

skills.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
skills.description: On-page and off-page SEO (backlinking, schema markup, meta tags, and keywords), Google SEO tools (Analytics, Webmaster, PageSpeed Insights) and GTMetrix for site performance benchmark and analysis.
